import "./dice.css" import $ from 'jquery' import { useEffect } from 'react'; import * as THREE from './../libs/three.min.js' import * as CANNON from './../libs/cannon.min.js' import { dice_initialize} from './main.js' export default function DiceReact() { useEffect(()=> { dice_initialize(document.querySelector('[data-dice-body]')); }, []) function handleInput(e) { } return (
teal dice

Loading libraries, please wait a bit...

click to continue or tap and drag again
choose your dice set by clicking the dices or by direct input of notation,
tap and drag on free space of screen or hit throw button to roll
handleInput(e.target.value)} >
) }
